hooks.command: grep -oE '`(docs/[^`]+|[A-Z]+\.md|\.claude/skills/[^`]+)`' "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null | tr -d '`' | while read ref; do [ ! -f "$ref" ] && echo "WARNING: 断链引用 $ref 在 $CLAUDE_FILE_PATH 中"; done; true

lines=$(wc -l < "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null); if [ "$lines" -gt 400 ]; then echo "CRITICAL: CLAUDE.md ${lines}行 (上限400)。提取到docs/"; elif [ "$lines" -gt 250 ]; then echo "WARNING: CLAUDE.md ${lines}行 (目标<250)"; fi; true
lines=$(wc -l < "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null); [ "$lines" -gt 500 ] && echo "WARNING: $CLAUDE_FILE_PATH 有 ${lines} 行，考虑拆分以避免 File Too Large 错误" ; true
